topic: Opportunities for changing study programs and ECTS credits
question: Hello, I received the result of a retake exam today and therefore did not pass the ECTS hurdle. I have been studying computer science games engineering for 3 years and only have 86 ECTS. I would like to know if it is possible to switch to another computer science course and keep some of my ECTS, and if so, how."
answer: Hello, it is best to come to one of our open consultation hours without making an appointment. There we can discuss your current situation and evaluate your options together.
